translation.en: [narrator] Once upon a time, there was a baker from Chicago.
translation.zh:
‎很久很久以前
‎有个来自芝加哥的烘培师

translation.en: Merry Christmas.
[narrator] That's me, Stacy,
who looks just like Margaret, the duchess of Montenaro.
translation.zh:
‎我长得跟蒙塔纳罗女王玛格丽特
‎一模一样

translation.en: Stacy, me again, married the handsome Prince Edward at Christmas,
translation.zh:
‎于是这个史黛西 没错 又是我
‎在圣诞节嫁给了英俊的爱德华王子

translation.en: while Margaret married my adorable best friend Kevin
translation.zh:
‎玛格丽特则嫁给了
‎我帅气的好朋友凯文

translation.en: right before she was crowned queen of Montenaro,
translation.zh: ‎而后加冕成为蒙塔纳罗女王

translation.en: which almost didn't happen,
translation.zh: ‎但这场女王加冕礼差点中断

translation.en: because her cousin Fiona, who looks like both of us
translation.zh:
‎因为她有个长相
‎跟我们一模一样的堂妹菲欧娜

translation.en: and is so over-the-top…
Maggie Moo!
[Stacy] …impersonated her in an attempt to steal the throne.
translation.zh: ‎她乔装成玛格丽特 企图篡位

translation.en: Luckily, Fiona was caught and sentenced to many years of community service.
translation.zh:
‎好在菲欧娜被揭穿
‎被判履行多年社会服务

translation.en: I thought she should go to jail, but Margaret says she's family.
translation.zh:
‎我还以为她会被判坐牢呢
‎但玛格丽特说她终究是家人

translation.en: [chuckles] Could Christmas get any more eventful?
-Well, maybe. -[sirens wail]
Because this year, I'm cochairing
translation.zh: ‎因为我和玛格丽特今年将一起主持

translation.en: an international Christmas festival with Margaret,
who's just about my best friend in the world.
translation.zh: ‎玛格丽特是我在这世上最要好的闺蜜

translation.en: And to commemorate the occasion,
the Vatican has loaned us the Star of Peace,
a priceless relic that once belonged to Saint Nicholas himself.
translation.zh:
‎那是圣·尼古拉斯本尊
‎生前留下的无价之宝

translation.en: The Star will be kept under guard until it goes on top of a ginormous tree
translation.zh:
‎和平之星目前受到严格看守
‎并将于圣诞节前夕

translation.en: at our tree-lighting ceremony on Christmas Eve.
translation.zh: ‎在圣诞树亮灯礼中的圣诞树上亮相

translation.en: Oh, and that's Cardinal Amoah, the special emissary from the Vatican.
translation.zh:
‎那位是红衣主教阿莫尔
‎梵蒂冈外交特使

translation.en: Oh, this is so huge!
Can you believe this?
It's incredible.
I feel like we're making history.
Because you are making history.
translation.zh: ‎因为你们的确在创造历史啊

translation.en: Your Royal Majesty, Your Highness,
I present to you the Star of Peace.
No one's getting paid a dime. It all goes to charity.
translation.zh: ‎没人获得半分钱 全数捐给慈善机构

translation.en: Yes, we had a cancellation,
translation.zh: ‎对 有一组人退出表演行列

translation.en: so there's one final audition to fill the spot in the program.
translation.zh:
‎所以我们将为这个表演空缺
‎举办最后一场面试

translation.en: [Kevin] Okay. Bye.
Stacy and I are handling the details ourselves, so we'll be there.
translation.zh:
‎细节方面我和史黛西会处理
‎到时我们会在场

translation.en: All right, thank you for checking. Bye.
[exhales] That's the last call I'm taking tonight. Me too.
translation.zh:
‎-我今晚不打算再接电话了
‎-我也是

translation.en: Oh, except for this one. Hey, Liv!
translation.zh: ‎这通电话非接不可 嗨 丽芙

translation.en: -Merry Christmas! -Merry Christmas.
Mm, we miss you, darling. How were exams?
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的 我们很想念你 考试顺利吗？

translation.en: [Olivia] A major pain.
I love the ballet academy, don't get me wrong,
translation.zh: ‎别误会了 我很喜欢这家芭蕾舞学院

translation.en: but they make you work really hard on the school part.
Oh, it's nothing you can't handle.
Are you on your way to the airport?
That's why I called. JFK's closed because of the weather.
translation.zh:
‎这就是我打给你们的原因
‎约翰·肯尼迪机场因气候不佳关闭了

translation.en: The chaperone says we might leave from Bradley.
translation.zh: ‎随从说我们大可从布拉德利机场起飞

translation.en: Oh. Well, keep us posted.
I love you.
I love you more.
I'll sleep better once I know she's here.
translation.zh: ‎我要知道她安全回国后才能睡得安稳

translation.en: Yeah. You and me both.
Come here.
[Edward] Very good, Your Majesty.
Margaret and I love working together. Yeah, I'm sure we'll do it again.
translation.zh: ‎我和玛格丽特很喜欢一起做事 ‎我相信我们一定还有机会合作的

translation.en: It's just right now we kinda have our hands full.
We would love to see the corgis as well.
translation.zh: ‎我们也很想见见那只柯基犬

translation.en: -Absolutely. You can quote me. -Yes. And a very Merry Christmas to you.
translation.zh:
‎-没问题 你就说是我的意思
‎-也祝你圣诞快乐

translation.en: -Thank you so much. Bye. -[Edward] Cheers.
Well, that makes 11 ambassadors,
translation.zh: ‎如此说来 到时将有11名外交使节

translation.en: nine prime ministers, seven kings, four queens,
translation.zh: ‎九国总理、七国国王、四国女王

translation.en: an entire delegation from Penglia--
translation.zh: ‎以及蓬莱山的整个代表团出席

translation.en: And a partridge in a pear tree? -[sighs] Something like that. -[Stacy laughs]
translation.zh:
‎-还有“一只梨树上的鹧鸪鸟” 对吧？
‎-可以这么说吧

translation.en: I'm so glad I have you to help me with all this crazy last-minute stuff.
translation.zh:
‎很高兴有你帮忙处理
‎这些临时临急的要紧事

translation.en: We make a great team, don't we? Just like your dear old Chicago Red Sox.
translation.zh:
‎我们是个默契十足的团队
‎就像你支持的老芝加哥“红”袜队

translation.en: It's White Sox.
Yes, them as well. All the socks.
[choir] ♪ We wish you a Merry Christmas ♪
♪ We wish you a Merry Christmas ♪
♪ We wish you a Merry Christmas ♪
♪ And a Happy New Year ♪
-Oh, bravo! -Fabulous.
-Thank you very much. -This way please, ladies and gentlemen.
translation.zh:
‎-十分感谢
‎-各位先生女士 往这边走

translation.en: Maybe we put them after the yodeler?
translation.zh:
‎也许可以安排他们
‎在约德尔歌后出场？

translation.en: Do we really need a yodeler?
Well, we don't want to offend the Swiss ambassador.
We don't want to offend anyone.
[clicks tongue] Yeah.
I'm terribly sorry to interrupt, Your Majesty, but we have,
translation.zh: ‎陛下 十分抱歉 打扰了

translation.en: well, a bit of a situation.
This is Inspector Moretti, superintendent of police.
translation.zh: ‎这位是高级警司莫拉蒂警督

translation.en: The police? Well, that sounds serious.
I'm afraid it is, Your Majesty.
[Stacy] The Star of Peace is gone.
[exhales] This can't be happening.
Isn't the museum vault under guard around the clock?
translation.zh:
‎博物馆的宝库
‎不是全天候受到严密看守吗？

translation.en: The guards were drugged.
We found traces of chloromethazine in the ventilation system that services the security office.
translation.zh:
‎我们在保安办事处的通风系统中
‎发现氯甲烷的痕迹

translation.en: Surely there's surveillance footage.
The thieves wiped the hard drives clean.
translation.zh: ‎盗贼把硬盘里的监控录像都删除了

translation.en: Whoever did this came prepared.
We've notified Interpol, but with no forensic evidence,
translation.zh:
‎我们已经通知国际刑警了
‎但苦于缺乏法医学证据

translation.en: we've very little to go on.
Just please promise us you'll get it back in time for the ceremony.
translation.zh:
‎请你们答应我一定要在亮灯礼前
‎把和平之星找回来

translation.en: I'm afraid that would be a piecrust promise.
Easily made, easily broken.
translation.zh: ‎随口许下的承诺 往往都易碎

translation.en: Oh dear!
We'd like to keep the investigation confidential until we know more.
translation.zh:
‎在取得任何进展之前
‎我们希望大家能就调查过程保密

translation.en: Well, shall we notify the cardinal?
Since it's possible the breach came from within Vatican security,
translation.zh:
‎我们怀疑保安漏洞
‎跟梵蒂冈保安队有关

translation.en: Interpol has asked us to hold off until we rule them out.
translation.zh:
‎国际刑警要我们对梵蒂冈保密
‎直到他们摆脱嫌疑为止

translation.en: Just know we're doing everything we can.
translation.zh:
‎我们正在竭尽所能地展开调查
‎还望陛下谅解

translation.en: Well, thank you, Inspector.
[sighs] The relic of Saint Nicholas.
I mean, this is an international scandal of epic proportions.
[Kevin] Let's just try to stay calm, okay?
translation.zh: ‎我们试着保持冷静 好吗？

translation.en: Yes, of course. [clears throat] Keep calm.
-I sympathize with you completely. -[sighs] Thank you.
But when the crown jewels of Belgravia were stolen,
translation.zh: ‎当年贝尔格莱维亚的御宝失窃时

translation.en: oh, my grandfather, the king, was nearly deposed.
translation.zh:
‎当时的国王
‎也就是我爷爷 差点被废黜

translation.en: -[sighs] -Not helping.
But the jewels were eventually recovered.
-Well, bits and pieces. -Ah.
A ruby here, a sapphire there, a diamond, you know.
translation.zh:
‎这边一颗红宝石 那边一颗蓝宝石
‎还找到一颗钻石 你懂的

translation.en: Dude. Come on.
There must be something we can do.
-[exhales] -The police are handling it.
They have no clues and no leads.
translation.zh: ‎但警方还未掌握任何情报和线索

translation.en: Wait. If the police don't have any leads,
then it's up to us to come up with something they haven't thought of.
translation.zh:
‎那我们应该想想
‎他们在调查过程中漏了什么

translation.en: Like what?
Well, what we need is someone with information that the police don't have.
translation.zh:
‎我们需要找个人
‎去取得警方无法掌握的情报

translation.en: Someone with connections to the black market,
and it wouldn't hurt if they were just a little bit crooked.
A little crooked?
Yes, indeed.
We need a person who actually thinks like a criminal,
translation.zh: ‎我们需要一个拥有犯罪思路的人

translation.en: who has a history of never considering consequences,
and has absolutely no fear of breaking the rules.
-If only we knew someone like that. -[both] Fiona.
translation.zh:
‎真希望我们认识这种人 ‎-菲欧娜
‎-菲欧娜

translation.en: If anyone knows the unseemly side of things, it's my cousin.
translation.zh:
‎只有我堂妹
‎能看出事情不为人知的另一面

translation.en: [scoffs] I should know.
I'm sorry. Let me get this straight.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 让我搞清楚你们的想法

translation.en: You want to employ the woman who, with the help of her cohorts,
translation.zh: ‎你们有意招徕一个曾经招揽同伙

translation.en: masqueraded as you in an attempt to take over the country?
translation.zh:
‎乔装成你以图天下的女人
‎来协助你们破案？

translation.en: Didn't she go to jail?
Fiona's serving a sentence of community service at St. Michael's Convent.
translation.zh:
‎菲欧娜被判处在圣·迈克尔修道院
‎履行社会服务

translation.en: I was actually thinking of inviting her for Christmas before any of this happened.
translation.zh:
‎发生这种事之前
‎我还打算邀请她出席圣诞庆典呢

translation.en: You were?
I've always felt sorry for her,
growing up in boarding schools with no one to look after her.
translation.zh: ‎她在寄宿学校长大 孤苦伶仃的

translation.en: I think this past year at the convent's done her some good.
translation.zh:
‎她在修道院待了一年
‎我相信她应该有所觉悟了

translation.en: Not that much good.
Look, it's not like I trust Fiona,
translation.zh: ‎你听我说 我也信不过菲欧娜

translation.en: but I mean, St. Michael's is less than an hour away,
translation.zh:
‎只是圣·迈克尔修道院
‎距离皇宫只有不到一小时车程

translation.en: and the police are stumped.
It would be unconscionable to sit here and do nothing.
translation.zh: ‎待在宫里闲着 我心里会过意不去

translation.en: What have we got to lose?
translation.zh: ‎再说我们也没什么好损失的

translation.en: You know, anything and everything that isn't nailed down, but… [sighs]
translation.zh: ‎很难说 有很多事还没定案 可是…

translation.en: …I can't think of any other ideas, so…
Kev?
[sighs] I'll start nailing things down.
[nun] You missed a spot.
Where?
[nun] The library.
You know, the place with the books.
translation.zh: ‎你懂的 也就是藏书的地方

translation.en: [scoffs] It's time for my break.
[nun] Need I remind you, Fiona Pembroke,
translation.zh: ‎菲欧娜·潘布洛克 要我提醒你吗？

translation.en: that you still owe 1,242 hours -of community service? -[watch beeps]
translation.zh: ‎你还要履行12042小时的社会服务

translation.en: [nun] Be that as it may, Mother Superior wants to see you in her office.
translation.zh: ‎得了吧 院长要你到她的办公室见她

translation.en: Now!
Savage.
The sisters and I are absolutely thrilled
translation.zh: ‎得知潘布洛克小姐将与您共度圣诞

translation.en: Ms. Pembroke will be spending Christmas with you.
translation.zh: ‎我和众姐妹可真是满心欢喜

translation.en: She's the only family I have left.
translation.zh: ‎毕竟她是我所剩无几的亲人

translation.en: Well, and her mother, but I haven't seen my aunt in years.
translation.zh:
‎当然她母亲也是
‎但我已经很久没见到我阿姨了

translation.en: I do hope Fiona hasn't been too much trouble.
translation.zh: ‎我真心希望她没给你们带来太多麻烦

translation.en: We are all God's children, my dear. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的 我们都是上帝的子女

translation.en: Maggie Moo!
What a scrumptious surprise.
Oh, you're looking well.
What brings you to my private little corner of purgatory?
translation.zh:
‎是什么风把你吹来了
‎我在这个炼狱专属的小角落？

translation.en: I thought it might be pleasant for us to have the holidays together.
translation.zh:
‎我想要邀请你一起度过圣诞季
‎有你在会热闹点

translation.en: Oh. Will I be mopping or dusting?
[chuckles] You'll be our guest.
translation.zh: ‎你将会以皇家宾客的身份出席

translation.en: [Mother Superior] After, uh, prayerful consideration,
I've told Her Majesty I could allow a discrete bending of the rules,
translation.zh: ‎我跟陛下说 我们不介意网开一面

translation.en: seeing as it's Christmas.
As long as you promise to return by December 26th.
translation.zh:
‎只要你答应我们
‎一定要在12月26日前赶回来

translation.en: There's a hearing of the disciplinary committee
translation.zh: ‎纪委会将就你召开一场听证会

translation.en: for which you must be present.
We absolutely promise to have her back in time, Mother Superior.
translation.zh: ‎院长 我们答应你 一定准时送她回来

translation.en: You have my word.
[inhales] Well, in that case,
Ms. Pembroke is free to spend the holidays at the palace.
translation.zh:
‎我就让潘布洛克小姐到皇宫里
‎跟您一起庆祝圣诞

translation.en: Sounds like a gas.
Thank you, Inspector.
Yeah, keep us posted.
Anything?
They thought they had a lead, but it didn't pan out.
translation.zh:
‎他们以为掌握了一条线索
‎结果毫无下文

translation.en: [exhales] We could certainly use some good news right about now.
No worries, royal six-pack. Good news has arrived.
translation.zh: ‎别担心 腹肌君 你要的好消息来了

translation.en: Special delivery.
-Handle with care. -[Fiona] Hm.
[Stacy] Um, Reggie and Mindy? You gotta be kidding me.
translation.zh:
‎莱吉和明迪也来了？
‎你跟我闹着玩的吧？

translation.en: Fiona agreed to help us, but she said she needed her squad.
translation.zh:
‎菲欧娜答应帮我们
‎条件是她必须用自己的团队

translation.en: -Weren't they in jail as well? -[scoffs]
They were, but I, uh, pulled a few strings. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎之前是 我动用关系把他们放了出来

translation.en: Well, it's good to be queen.
How's my fave cuzzie-in-law?
Fine, I guess.
I hope you ain't still sore over our little mix-up last Christmas.
translation.zh:
‎希望你已经放下了
‎去年圣诞节发生的误会

translation.en: -Mix-up? -[Reggie] Yeah.
You kidnapped me!
Okay. Still sore.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 看来有人还没放下

translation.en: Spicy.
Why don't I have Mrs. Donatelli show you your rooms?
translation.zh:
‎不如我吩咐多纳泰利夫人
‎带你们去看看你们的房间吧？

translation.en: This way. Please.
Meow.
Right, yes, uh,
meow to you as well.
-No respect. -[mouths] No.
None. Cool.
Am I late for brekkie?
Only by an hour… or three.
No worries. I couldn't eat a thing.
translation.zh: ‎放心吧 我什么都吃不下

translation.en: But I do have news. I've been in touch with an associate
translation.zh:
‎但我取得了新情报
‎我一直跟一个同党保持联系

translation.en: who should be able to help us find our missing treasure.
translation.zh: ‎他也许能够帮我们找到失窃的珍宝

translation.en: [Margaret] Does this associate have a name?
I'd rather not say until he's on board, but trust me, he's the GOAT.
translation.zh:
‎等他正式加入后 我才透露他的名字
‎相信我 他就是王道

translation.en: Sorry, he's… he's a goat?
"Greatest of all time," babe. It's like a sports thing.
translation.zh: ‎“王道”是体育界常用的一个术语

translation.en: I knew that. I… I knew that.
[Mindy] I bet it's that count from Barcelona.
translation.zh: ‎我猜是那个巴塞罗那伯爵吧

translation.en: [Reggie] Nah, he's a squirrelly one.
translation.zh: ‎才不是呢 那个家伙是个怪人

translation.en: Never looks you square in the eye.
He's got a glass eye, idiot.
[inhales] I'll need to borrow a car,
and preferably a 'rari that matches my Manolos.
translation.zh:
‎最好是法拉利跑车
‎好搭配我的马诺洛高跟鞋

translation.en: Don't worry. Frank will be happy to drive you.
translation.zh: ‎这点你放心 弗兰克很乐意接送你

translation.en: Don't you trust me, royal boo?
[Stacy] Hell no.
And Bonnie and Clyde are staying right here
translation.zh: ‎这对雌雄双煞不能离开皇宫

translation.en: just to make sure you come back.
-[scoffs] -Here? What are we supposed to do all day?
translation.zh:
‎待在宫里？
‎那我们整天闲着能干什么？

translation.en: Perhaps you could start by, uh, returning the silver.
translation.zh: ‎第一件事就是把你偷走的银器交出来

translation.en: Reggie!
What?
[sighs] Dear.
Right. Okay. Now look, I don't wish to be impertinent, Your Ladyship,
translation.zh: ‎小姐 听好 请恕我无礼

translation.en: but if you're not out in 20 minutes,
I have strict orders to come in there and fetch.
translation.zh:
‎我受到严格指示
‎一旦超时 我只好冲进去把你带走

translation.en: Bossy.
Remember! Twenty minutes!
You haven't lost your touch.
Some say.
You're looking well, Peter.
You too, Pemmie.
It's Pembroke.
You'll always be Pemmie to me.
translation.zh: ‎你永远是我心中的那个小潘潘

translation.en: So, how long has it been since you walked out on me that spring night in Barbados?
translation.zh:
‎你在巴巴多斯离开我的那个夏夜
‎是多久以前了？

translation.en: Oh, please.
We were always better as friends. Everything else was a complication.
translation.zh:
‎我们向来都是当朋友比较合适
‎换成其他关系就复杂起来了

translation.en: That's an interesting word for it.
I heard from Bianca the other day.
Mummy's always had a soft spot for you since we were in nappies.
translation.zh: ‎从小到大 我妈一直都很喜欢你

translation.en: She says you won't return her calls.
I have nothing to say.
[Peter] Oh, come on, Pemmie. It's Christmas.
translation.zh: ‎别这样 小潘潘 圣诞节都快到了

translation.en: Give the old girl a break.
If I remember, you weren't speaking to your father.
translation.zh:
‎我记得你以前
‎不也不想跟你爸说话吗？

translation.en: No. I wasn't.
translation.zh: ‎没错 我以前的确不想见到他

translation.en: But I saw him last Christmas, two days before he passed.
translation.zh:
‎但去年圣诞季
‎在他离世之前 我去见过他了

translation.en: And I'm very glad I did.
Well, now that we've limped down memory lane, can we talk business?
translation.zh:
‎怎么开始忆当年了？
‎可以谈正经事了吗？

translation.en: The Star of Peace.
You want my help getting it back.
Question is, why is it so important to you?
translation.zh:
‎我想知道
‎你为什么这么看重这件事？

translation.en: [Fiona] Well, it's important to my cuzzie.
I treated her… [sighs] …unkindly,
so I thought I'd make it up to her.
translation.zh: ‎我想借此机会弥补我的过失

translation.en: [chuckles] Yes, I heard about your little escapade.
So, will you help despite our colorful past?
translation.zh:
‎不知道你愿不愿意不计前嫌
‎帮我一把？

translation.en: You know the answer to that.
No matter what, no matter where?
Let me show you what I've dug up. [chuckles softly]
-Are you coming? -Mm.
Et voilà! The Interpol case file.
translation.zh: ‎找到了 这就是国际刑警的档案

translation.en: Interpol? I thought you left them.
translation.zh: ‎国际刑警？你不是辞职不干了吗？

translation.en: That doesn't mean I've forgotten how to get around their firewalls.
translation.zh:
‎辞职不意味着我已经忘了
‎怎么“翻墙”潜入国际刑警的档案库

translation.en: -Oh. -According to this report,
translation.zh:
‎辞职不意味着我已经忘了
‎怎么“翻墙”潜入国际刑警的档案库 ‎根据这些报告 警方还没找到嫌犯

translation.en: there are no suspects in the theft,
translation.zh: ‎根据这些报告 警方还没找到嫌犯

translation.en: but the interesting bit
is that chloromethazine was used to drug the guards.
translation.zh: ‎盗贼用来迷晕守卫的氯甲烷

translation.en: Why on earth is that interesting?
Interpol is utterly convinced
that the black-market supply is limited to an Asian distributor.
translation.zh:
‎这种氯甲烷在黑市上
‎只供应给一个身在亚洲的供应商

translation.en: And it is,
except for one disreputable pharmacist in Geneva,
translation.zh: ‎但日内瓦还有一个臭名在外的药剂师

translation.en: who runs an after-hours operation out of the back of his warehouse on Place du Port.
translation.zh:
‎下班后经常跑到
‎其位于码头广场的药妆店后巷交易

translation.en: [inhales] Now, lucky for us,
there are security cameras all along the riverbank.
translation.zh: ‎河岸旁设有好几台监控摄像机

translation.en: I searched through the last three days of footage and came up with this.
translation.zh:
‎过去三天 我搜查了所有监控录像
‎结果找到了这个画面

translation.en: That's Itai Krauss.
Do I know him?
Indirectly.
He works for an old friend of yours.
translation.zh: ‎他目前在你一个老朋友手下办事

translation.en: -[computer beeps] -Hunter Cunard,
the billionaire hotel tycoon.
Why would a hotel tycoon steal the Star of Peace?
translation.zh:
‎堂堂一个酒店大亨
‎为什么要偷走和平之星？

translation.en: It's a little-known fact that Hunter's secret obsession
translation.zh: ‎很少人知道亨特私下的爱好

translation.en: is collecting precious items that aren't for sale.
Paintings, antiquities, jewels. He loves an impossible challenge.
translation.zh:
‎例如古画、古董和珠宝
‎他热爱不可能的任务

translation.en: You've been an invaluable help, Mr. Maxwell.
translation.zh: ‎麦士威先生 你帮了我们一个大忙

translation.en: I'm certain the police will be grateful for the information.
translation.zh:
‎我相信警方一定会感激你
‎提供这些情报

translation.en: Maggie, don't be silly. You can't go to the police.
translation.zh: ‎小玛格 别傻了 我们不能知会警方

translation.en: Why not?
Hunter has friends everywhere.
One wrong word to the wrong person, and the Star disappears forever.
translation.zh:
‎一旦消息传入错的人耳中
‎就再也找不到和平之星了

translation.en: [scoffs] So, what do we do?
The only thing you can do.
You steal it back.
How?
Every Christmas, Hunter hosts an exclusive soiree at his estate.
translation.zh:
‎每年圣诞季 亨特都会在自家庄园
‎举办一场私人晚宴

translation.en: It happens to be this Saturday night.
[sighs] Well, I assume security will be tight as a drum.
-Oh. -[Peter] It will be, but there'll also be people coming and going,
translation.zh: ‎那是肯定的 但现场也必定人来人往

translation.en: caterers, florists, guests, which affords us the perfect opportunity.
translation.zh:
‎餐饮服务员、花艺师、宾客
‎是我们混入现场的大好机会

translation.en: All we have to do is make sure Hunter is occupied,
translation.zh: ‎我们只要确保亨特忙不过来就可以了

translation.en: and lucky for us, he used to be quite enamored of Fiona.
translation.zh:
‎我们还有一个优势
‎他曾经对菲欧娜着迷不已

translation.en: Oh! So, uh, this bad boy had a thing for you, huh?
translation.zh: ‎原来那个坏男人曾经对你深深着迷？

translation.en: Oh, we had a bit of a steamy. [chuckles] But he wasn't my type.
translation.zh:
‎我们有过一段缠绵悱恻的爱情
‎只可惜他不是我的菜

translation.en: So, when was the last time you spoke to this Mr. Cunard?
translation.zh: ‎你上一次见到库纳先生是什么时候？

translation.en: [scoffs] A few years ago. We both moved on.
translation.zh: ‎几年前吧 我们都已经放下了

translation.en: If it's been years, how are you gonna get invited to the party?
translation.zh:
‎时隔这么多年
‎你要怎么才能受邀参加这场晚宴？

translation.en: Hunter walks his dog through the park behind the library
translation.zh:
‎亨特每天早上8点都会带他的爱犬
‎到图书馆后面的公园散步

translation.en: every morning at 8:00 a.m., rain or shine.
translation.zh:
‎亨特每天早上8点都会带他的爱犬
‎到图书馆后面的公园散步 ‎风雨不改

translation.en: Fiona will do the same.
translation.zh: ‎菲欧娜也会带她的狗到那边散步

translation.en: I'm certain once they coincidentally run into each other,
she can charm an invitation out of him.
translation.zh: ‎她能凭借魅力要到一张请柬

translation.en: Where is she gonna get a dog?
Hm, I can pinch her a pooch.
Forgive me, but aren't you the Peter Maxwell who worked for Interpol
translation.zh:
‎请恕我冒昧 ‎你不是那个被控参与
‎大规模钻石盗窃案的前国际刑警

translation.en: and was, well, charged with a rather large-scale diamond theft?
translation.zh:
‎你不是那个被控参与
‎大规模钻石盗窃案的前国际刑警 ‎彼得·麦斯威吗？

translation.en: The charges were dismissed, but the incident tarnished my reputation,
translation.zh:
‎法院已经撤销了对我的控诉
‎只是那件事让我名誉扫地

translation.en: so I resigned and started my own private security firm,
translation.zh:
‎于是我决定辞职
‎并创立了一家私营保安公司

translation.en: which has proven quite lucrative.
Mm-hmm. So what's your finder's fee?
-There is no fee. -Why not?
Let's just say… I have my reasons.
translation.zh: ‎这么说吧 我有我的理由

translation.en: [exhales] This isn't a dog. It's bloody Big Foot.
translation.zh: ‎这不是一只狗 这是一个大脚怪

translation.en: Pugsley's a pussycat. You just don't know how to handle him.
translation.zh:
‎帕斯利很乖的
‎你只是不知道怎么驾驭它

translation.en: [Fiona scoffs] I know how I'm going to handle you if I break a heel.
translation.zh: ‎如果我的鞋跟断了 我就要你好看

translation.en: If I can have your attention… [on comm] …Hunter's just arrived.
translation.zh: ‎请你们注意一下 亨特到了

translation.en: -[Fiona] Location? -[Peter] He's headed your way.
Oh, he's lush.
[Peter] You'll intersect his path in 100 yards.
translation.zh: ‎他再走100米 你们就会交汇

translation.en: Would you please get your nose out of that bush?
[Mindy] He just passed the latte stand.
Ugh, what seems to be your problem?
I don't have a problem.
Not you.
-No. No. -Pugsley!
Stop this at once! Naughty dog. Bad dog. Stop!
translation.zh:
‎马上给我站住！
‎坏狗狗 不乖 停下来！

translation.en: Dog! [gasps] Oh no.
Wretched.
My nail!
-[chuckles] -[Fiona] I've broken a nail!
-Where'd you get it from, a horse ranch? -Would you watch what you're saying?
translation.zh:
‎-那只狗你从马牧场弄来的吗？
‎-说话放客气点 好吗？

translation.en: You couldn't have got us a toy poodle?
translation.zh: ‎你怎么不弄一只小贵宾犬呢？

translation.en: Oh, because poodles grow on trees.
translation.zh: ‎你想要就有吗？贵宾犬长在树上吗？

translation.en: Did she say poodles grew on trees, genius?
translation.zh: ‎她说过贵宾犬长在树上吗 天才？

translation.en: Oh, look, it's a poodle tree. [gasps] Let's pick us a white one, shall we?
translation.zh:
‎你瞧 这是一棵结出贵宾犬的树
‎我们就摘下一只白贵宾吧？

translation.en: -Can we talk about plan B? -Thank God there's a plan B.
translation.zh:
‎-可以开始讨论后备计划了吗？
‎-好在还有后备计划

translation.en: Peter always has a plan B.
[Peter] Hunter's newest boutique hotel
is unveiling its Christmas decorations tonight.
translation.zh: ‎今晚将有一场圣诞装饰揭幕仪式

translation.en: He's planning a walk-through at four.
It might be a bit difficult to get his attention,
but I'm sure you'll be up to the challenge…
-[scoffs] -….once you freshen up a bit.
translation.zh: ‎但要等你梳洗干净后才行动

translation.en: Excuse you.
Messy becomes you, Pemmie, but it's a bit overdone.
translation.zh:
‎小潘潘 你向来都是乱糟糟的
‎只是这次有点过头了

translation.en: Here.
I hate to interrupt,
but if we're gonna get there by four, we better get on with it.
translation.zh:
‎如果我们要在4点前抵达现场
‎现在就要做准备了

translation.en: Yeah, just give me 20 minutes to moisturize.
You two aren't going anywhere.
-What? -What?
Do not ask me to explain why after what just happened.
translation.zh:
‎没看到刚刚发生什么意外吗？
‎我没必要解释

translation.en: -But I didn't do anything wrong! -Zzzt.
[Mindy] Now she's mad at me!
translation.zh:
‎-她竟然迁怒于我
‎-那不是我的错啊

translation.en: -[Reggie] That's not my fault. -[Mindy] Of course it is.
translation.zh:
‎-她竟然迁怒于我
‎-那不是我的错啊 ‎-明明就是你的错
‎-才不是呢

translation.en: -[Reggie] No, it's not. -[Mindy] It is.
-[Reggie] No, it's not. -[Mindy] It is.
-[woman 1] Hi! -[woman 2] Hi! It's you!
-Thank you for coming. -[woman 2] Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢你们捧场
‎-谢谢 亲爱的

translation.en: -[Peter on comm] Get ready. -[man] Yes, ma'am.
[woman 1] Come.
[Hunter] I guess it looks fine.
Just remember, finish by five, or you're fired.
translation.zh: ‎记住 5点前做好 否则等着被开除

translation.en: [woman 3] Yes, Mr. Cunard.
He's on his way.
[on comm] Be ready.
Absolutely.
Let's make some merry, shall we?
-Welcome to Santa's workshop. -[Fiona] Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-欢迎来到圣诞老人的梦工厂
‎-谢谢

translation.en: -[Santa] I hope you've been a good girl. -[Fiona chuckles] Never.
translation.zh:
‎-希望你过去一年内都没有使坏
‎-才怪

translation.en: Say mistletoe.
[both] Mistletoe!
[Fiona] Have you been naughty or nice?
Fiona Pembroke.
Hunter. [chuckles]
What on earth are you doing here?
I could ask you the same thing.
Well, age before beauty.
translation.zh: ‎那就让资历深的人来回答好了

translation.en: I own the place.
-You're joking. -Not at all.
Now it's your turn.
Well, the lounge here serves a candy cane martini that's to die for.
translation.zh:
‎听说这里的酒廊
‎有好喝得要命的甘蔗糖马丁尼

translation.en: Then what are we waiting for?
[Hunter] What about you? You been busy spending your inheritance?
translation.zh: ‎你呢？忙着挥霍你继承的遗产吗？

translation.en: More or less. It's all such a bore.
translation.zh: ‎可以这么说吧 有点闷了

translation.en: What ever happened to that dreary little rodent that you were seeing when we met?
translation.zh:
‎我们当初认识时
‎你那个鼠目獐头的对象还好吗？

translation.en: Peter something.
-Peter Maxwell. -[Fiona scoffs]
That wretched little man.
translation.zh: ‎你是指那个可怜巴巴的小子

translation.en: Oh, you were quite stuck on him as I recall.
translation.zh: ‎我记得你当时对他死心塌地似的

translation.en: I don't get stuck on anyone.
translation.zh: ‎我从来不对任何人死心塌地

translation.en: Oh, I'm well aware of that.
If I was a sentimental sort, I'd say you broke my heart.
translation.zh:
‎如果我是个感性的人
‎肯定会被你伤得很深

translation.en: Mm. We're quite the pair, aren't we?
-Cut from the same cloth. -[Fiona] Mm.
Which means we both know that you didn't just wander in here for the martinis.
translation.zh:
‎这么说来 你来到这里闲逛
‎不是单纯地想喝马丁尼

translation.en: So why don't you tell me the real reason for this coincidental meeting?
translation.zh:
‎不妨告诉我
‎安排这场巧遇的目的是什么吧

translation.en: All right.
It's true I inherited Daddy's fortune.
translation.zh: ‎没错 我的确继承了我爸的财产

translation.en: It's also true that there's very little of it left.
translation.zh: ‎没错 财产的确所剩无几了

translation.en: So you're here for a handout.
Oh, no. Not a handout. A proposition.
translation.zh: ‎不是 没要你施舍 但我有个献议

translation.en: What kind of proposition?
Well, the Pembroke estate, it would make a darling boutique hotel.
translation.zh: ‎潘布洛克庄园很适合改造成精品酒店

translation.en: You're not serious about selling.
translation.zh: ‎你该不会真的想卖掉那座庄园吧？

translation.en: Dead serious.
But Pembroke's been in your family for generations.
translation.zh:
‎你们家世世代代都住在潘布洛克庄园
‎怎么可能卖掉？

translation.en: If you're not interested… [scoffs]
Sit… down.
I didn't say I wasn't interested.
Let's talk about this after the New Year, shall we? I'm insanely busy until then.
translation.zh:
‎那我们新年过后再谈吧
‎我这阵子很忙

translation.en: [Hunter] All right.
After New Year's.
-[tango music intensifies] -Ciao.
[Hunter] Fiona!
I'm hosting a little holiday party at my home in the country on Saturday.
translation.zh:
‎这个星期六
‎我将在郊外的庄园办一场节庆聚会

translation.en: Cocktails at six, dinner at eight, if your busy schedule will allow.
translation.zh:
‎鸡尾酒会6点开始 晚宴8点开始
‎有空的话 欢迎你出席

translation.en: Will there be candy cane martinis?
translation.zh: ‎到时能不能喝到甘蔗糖马丁尼？

translation.en: Anything your heart desires.
Mm. Delicious. See you Saturday.
Oh, and, uh, you owe me a tango.
[Frank] Good evening, Ms. Pembroke.
Well?
You took a risk, and it paid off.
Is that all you have to say?
If Hunter wasn't utterly besotted with you,
translation.zh: ‎好在亨特被你迷得神魂颠倒

translation.en: he'd have called your bluff, and we'd be up a creek right now.
translation.zh:
‎不然他就会揭穿你
‎到时我们惹上麻烦了

translation.en: You're jealous.
[scoffs] I'm not jealous.
Oh, you're completely jealous.
-Do you want me to be jealous? -[Fiona scoffs]
Don't be ridiculous.
Because being jealous would mean there's something between us.
translation.zh:
‎如果我吃醋了
‎就说明我们的关系不单纯

translation.en: -And there is nothing between us. -Absolutely nothing.
translation.zh:
‎-我们的关系可是清清楚楚的
‎-绝对单纯

translation.en: -Positively nothing. -Completely nothing.
♪ Like this I'm gonna show you ♪
[sighs] It's Mummy again.
Just say hello.
That's all she wants.
[Fiona] But you said we would be together for Christmas.
translation.zh: ‎可是你说过我们会一起过圣诞的

translation.en: [Bianca] I know I did, darling, but something's come up.
translation.zh: ‎妈妈知道 亲爱的 但妈妈突然有事

translation.en: You're gonna have so much fun here at Manderston.
translation.zh:
‎你在曼德斯顿学院
‎一定会玩得很开心的

translation.en: Look, Peter's staying as well. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎你看 彼得也留在学校啊

translation.en: There. That's settled, then.
Don't go!
[Bianca] Oh, Fiona, darling. Fiona, chin up.
Mummy's got a plane to catch.
-I made this for you. -[Bianca] Oh.
Oh. Charming.
Ciao, bella. Kiss, kiss.
This is a 3D blueprint of Hunter Cunard's Montenaro estate.
translation.zh:
‎这是亨特·库纳
‎蒙塔纳罗庄园的三维蓝图

translation.en: Hunter's private office, here, is located on a separate wing.
translation.zh:
‎这是亨特的私人办公室
‎位于另一个独立的建筑物里

translation.en: The adjoining gallery, here, is where he keeps his art collection.
translation.zh:
‎跟办公室毗邻的艺廊
‎正是他收藏珍贵艺术品的地方

translation.en: The entry is operated by a keypad with a six-digit security code.
translation.zh: ‎入口处有个六位数密码按键式门锁

translation.en: And once you're inside the gallery?
translation.zh: ‎进入艺廊后会出现什么状况？

translation.en: The display case is surrounded by a web of laser motion detectors.
translation.zh: ‎展示柜周围都有镭射网运动传感器

translation.en: -We'll need to disarm them. -Dibs on the lasers!
translation.zh:
‎-进去后 先要解除这个装置
‎-我可以穿过镭射网

translation.en: I'm double-jointed. [chuckles]
It'll take a team of three to pull it off.
And then what?
This is an overlay of the internal camera system.
translation.zh: ‎这是内部监控摄像系统的覆盖范围

translation.en: One of us taps into the circuitry, overrides the camera system
translation.zh:
‎其中一人负责黑入电路
‎取得监控录像系统的控制权

translation.en: while the other two break into the gallery and steal the Star of Peace.
translation.zh:
‎另外两人则负责潜入艺廊
‎偷走和平之星

translation.en: This is going to be like breaking into Fort Knox.
[Peter] We have little time to practice.
Everything must be perfect, or we run the risk of getting caught.
translation.zh:
‎所有步骤都不能出错
‎不然我们就会被逮着

translation.en: And what happens if you do get caught?
Well, Hunter can't call the police to report the theft of something he's stolen.
translation.zh:
‎亨特总不可能报警说
‎自己偷来的东西失窃了

translation.en: In situations like this,
he has a history of making the problem disappear. Forever.
translation.zh:
‎他会让问题永远消失
‎这不会是第一次了

translation.en: We've forgotten the biggest problem of all.
Which is?
I have nothing to wear.
You know, you never told us what our cut is for this little caper.
translation.zh:
‎话说我们还没谈过
‎这项不法任务的酬劳

translation.en: Well, the cut, Reggie, is to spend Christmas with Maggie at the palace.
translation.zh:
‎莱吉 酬劳就是
‎跟玛格丽特在皇宫里共度圣诞

translation.en: Truth is, we really do owe her a favor.
Maybe, but that doesn't explain Peter Maxwell.
translation.zh:
‎也许是吧
‎但彼得·麦斯威加入就说不过去了

translation.en: -[Reggie] Hmm! -Unlike the two of you,
Peter is an expert at getting past security systems without getting caught.
translation.zh: ‎他能够神不知鬼不觉地黑入保安系统

translation.en: Oh, I bet he can get past your security systems, eh?
translation.zh: ‎我看他也能黑入你的“保安系统”吧？

translation.en: Excuse you.
Oh, admit it, Fif. You're a smitten kitten.
translation.zh: ‎菲菲 你就承认吧 你明明很喜欢他

translation.en: There was a time, but it was long ago.
translation.zh:
‎有段时间确实对他有感觉
‎但那是很久以前了

translation.en: Nah. Reggie's onto something.
translation.zh: ‎才怪 莱吉看出了一些端倪

translation.en: There's a little bit of flirty dirty going on.
translation.zh:
‎你和彼得之间
‎好像在明送秋波 暗通款曲

translation.en: A bit of do you, don't ya. Can't ya, won't ya.
translation.zh:
‎你进我退 我退你进
‎欲迎还拒 欲拒还迎

translation.en: -Get out. -Oh, come on, Fif!
translation.zh:
‎-滚出去
‎-你就承认吧 菲菲

translation.en: You gotta give us more than that!
Get out now.
[laughs] All right. Don't get your knickers in a twist.
You miss your mum, don't you?
[hesitates] I don't think she loves me anymore.
Of course she does.
Then why would she leave me all alone at Christmas?
translation.zh:
‎那她为什么让我一个人
‎孤零零地过圣诞呢？

translation.en: I'm here, and we'll always be friends.
translation.zh: ‎有我在啊 我们是永远的朋友

translation.en: Come here.
See that up there?
No matter where you are,
all you have to do is look up at the North Star,
translation.zh: ‎只要抬头仰望天空上的北极星

translation.en: and you'll never be alone,
'cause wherever I am, you know I'll be looking up at it too.
translation.zh:
‎因为无论我在哪里
‎记住我也在抬头仰望着北极星

translation.en: -Promise? -Swear.
No matter what?
No matter where.
-[Reggie] Can you just carry some-- -[Frank] I know, I've got funny knees.
translation.zh:
‎-你能不能抬好一点？
‎-我知道 我的膝盖不好

translation.en: I'm just saying.
If you just--
[all] Ready.
This is an approximation of the motion sensor array in Hunter's gallery.
translation.zh:
‎这是在模拟
‎亨特艺廊里的运动传感镭射网

translation.en: And here we go.
This is where it gets tricky.
Oh, I get it. You need a partner to boost you over that high beam.
translation.zh:
‎你需要另一个搭档
‎助你翻过眼前高处的光束

translation.en: [Peter] Precisely.
It's the only way of getting through to the control panel on the other side.
translation.zh: ‎只有这样才能碰到另一端的控制面板

translation.en: Well, limber… [groans] …is my middle name.
Yeah.
Dear God.
Let's reset.
Let me have one more go, okay?
Watch and learn.
Done.
You're up, Reggie.
All right.
No.
"Meet me outside?"
[Fiona] Bon soir, Peter.
Shall we?
Wait for it.
-A client lent it to me for the evening. -How very James Bond.
translation.zh:
‎-有个客户把直升机借给我一晚
‎-简直就是《007》标准教科书

translation.en: [chuckles] Come on, Pemmie. It'll be like old times.
translation.zh: ‎走吧 小潘潘 让我们回到从前

translation.en: [Kevin] What's going on?
Oh, Fiona and Peter. They're really quite adorable together.
[Kevin] They better be heading up north.
[Margaret] Why's that?
Storm's moving in from the south. They closed the airport over an hour ago.
translation.zh:
‎暴风雪从北袭来
‎机场一小时前就关闭了

translation.en: Olivia.
She just texted. They've been rerouted to Brussels.
translation.zh:
‎她刚给我发了短信
‎飞机改航在布鲁塞尔机场降落

translation.en: I thought I'd surprise her and pick her up myself.
translation.zh: ‎我想给她一个惊喜 亲自到机场接她

translation.en: -When do you think you'll be back? -It's an eight-hour drive.
translation.zh:
‎-那你什么时候回来？
‎-前往机场要八小时车程

translation.en: If I leave first thing in the morning, I should be there by the time she lands.
translation.zh:
‎如果明早出发
‎就来得及在飞机降落时抵达

translation.en: So I'll only be gone a day, day and a half tops.
It should be fine.
Are you sure you're gonna be okay?
I mean with everything going on.
I'll be in meetings all morning,
and then there's tea with Cardinal Amoah, so you won't miss much.
translation.zh:
‎然后要跟红衣主教阿莫尔共进下午茶
‎所以我没时间想念你

translation.en: -I'll miss you. -[chuckles] I miss you already.
translation.zh: ‎但我会xiang nian ‎我已经开始想念你了

translation.en: Where are we going? The North Pole?
Almost. Hang on.
Go ahead. Take your best shot.
translation.zh: ‎去玩你有把握胜出的游戏吧

translation.en: Looks like Santa's elves smoked a little too much mistletoe.
translation.zh: ‎看来圣诞精灵嗑药嗑过头了

translation.en: [Peter] Oh, I've got an idea.
Please tell me it involves alcohol.
Guess again.
Painting something naughty on those snowmen.
Ice-skating.
You're joking.
You know you want to.
In your dreams.
Oh, come on. It'll be fun.
For you.
How do you feel about polar bears?
No one can ever know about this.
translation.zh: ‎这事绝对不能让任何人知道

translation.en: It'll be our little secret.
So, you're really spending Christmas with your cousin?
translation.zh: ‎你真打算跟你堂姐一起过圣诞？

translation.en: Well, better with Maggie than with Our Lady of Perpetual Pain.
translation.zh:
‎跟小玛格过圣诞
‎总好过跟那个苦情女过圣诞吧？

translation.en: Pemmie, it's quite all right to admit you have feelings for other people.
translation.zh:
‎小潘潘 承认自己在乎某个人
‎是没有错的

translation.en: You've gone mushy since the last time I saw you.
translation.zh: ‎你变得比我们最后一次见面更感性了

translation.en: -'Tis the season. -[scoffs]
Speaking of mushy, may I have this dance?
translation.zh:
‎说到感性
‎可以跟我一起跳这支舞吗？

translation.en: You're determined to smother us in holiday cheese, aren't you?
translation.zh:
‎你就这么想让我们沉溺在
‎甜死人不偿命的圣诞氛围里吗？

translation.en: You catch on quick.
Promise me you'll drive safely.
I promise. I'll be back before you know it.
translation.zh: ‎我答应你 我去去就回来

translation.en: Pete, old boy, is climbing the roof the only way to get into Hunter's house?
translation.zh:
‎彼得 天啊
‎我们只能从屋顶潜入亨特家吗？

translation.en: Yes, Reggie.
The trickiest part is getting back down.
translation.zh: ‎但最难的部分是从屋顶上落下

translation.en: Can't we just take the stairs?
Let's go.
[Amoah] I cannot tell you how impressed His Eminence was
that you and Princess Stacy have been involved in all the details of this wondrous event.
translation.zh:
‎您和史黛西公主亲自参与筹备
‎这场温馨美好的活动后有多高兴

translation.en: Most people would let others do the work and take the credit themselves. [laughs]
translation.zh:
‎多数人只会吩咐他人做事
‎功劳自己领

translation.en: Oh no, Stacy and I are…
are extremely involved.
As a matter of fact, she's in a meeting with the logistics committee right now,
translation.zh:
‎事实上 我们说话当儿
‎她就在跟后勤委员会开会

translation.en: but if she were here, she'd tell you how deeply moved we are
translation.zh: ‎如果她在场的话 ‎她肯定会告诉你

translation.en: that the Vatican chose to honor our efforts.
translation.zh:
‎我们对梵蒂冈决定向我们致意一事
‎有多么感动

translation.en: Oh, we have not always chosen wisely. Oh no, no, no.
translation.zh: ‎我们也不是每次都能做出明智的决策

translation.en: In fact, in the 16th century,
we loaned the Star of Peace to Harry the Horrible,
translation.zh: ‎我们曾经把和平之星借给昏君哈利

translation.en: the ruler of Caledonia.
translation.zh: ‎也就是当时的喀里多尼亚国王

translation.en: It was a great mistake.
A band of thieves nearly made away with it.
translation.zh: ‎那年和平之星差点被一群盗贼偷走

translation.en: They were tarred and feathered,
translation.zh:
‎他们后来被涂以柏油 覆以羽毛
‎以示惩戒

translation.en: but Harry was blamed because it happened on his watch.
translation.zh:
‎但错在哈利王
‎因为事情是在他眼皮底下发生的

translation.en: -[exhales] -The poor devil was excommunicated.
translation.zh: ‎那个可怜的昏君最后被逐出教会

translation.en: Are you all right, my dear?
Just overcome with emotion.
I understand completely.
The moment you light up that tree
not only will the eyes of the world be upon you but also the eyes of God.
translation.zh:
‎不仅普天下的人
‎都会把目光聚焦在您身上 ‎连上帝也会把目光聚焦在您身上

translation.en: I never thought of it like that.
Might I offer you a slice of yule log, Cardinal?
translation.zh: ‎主教 要吃一块圣诞树桩蛋糕吗？

translation.en: -I shouldn't. -[exhales]
translation.zh: ‎恕我不能 但适逢圣诞佳节…

translation.en: -But it is Christmas. [chuckles] -Please help yourself.
translation.zh: ‎恕我不能 但适逢圣诞佳节… ‎请慢用

translation.en: What in heaven's name was that?
translation.zh: ‎天啊 那到底是什么声音？

translation.en: That was the yodeler rehearsing for the ceremony.
translation.zh:
‎有人在练唱约德尔歌
‎为亮灯礼上的演出做准备

translation.en: The poor fellow sounded a bit hoarse.
translation.zh: ‎那个可怜的家伙歌声有点粗

translation.en: Which is why he needs to practice. [laughs]
The doctor said it's just a sprain.
There is no way you can climb up the side of a building.
translation.zh: ‎以你的情况是不可能沿墙爬上屋顶了

translation.en: I could supervise from the van.
translation.zh: ‎我大可在客货车上监控你们的行动

translation.en: -You're not supervising me, mate. -Wh-- [moans]
translation.zh: ‎老兄 我需要你来监控吗？

translation.en: We still need two people to get around security in the gallery.
translation.zh: ‎我们还缺两个负责闯入艺廊的人

translation.en: Mindy can't do it. She's handling the cameras.
translation.zh:
‎明迪不行
‎她要负责黑入监控摄像系统

translation.en: Why not let Fifi do it? She had the moves down cold.
translation.zh:
‎那就让菲菲去做吧
‎她的身手可厉害了

translation.en: Fiona will be with Hunter.
I'm afraid we're back to square one. We'll have to come up with something else.
translation.zh:
‎恐怕我们要重新布置了
‎我们必须想出其他办法

translation.en: But there isn't time to come up with something else.
translation.zh: ‎但我们没时间想出其他办法了

translation.en: [scoffs] Pay attention, Betty Crocker. I can't be at two places at once.
translation.zh:
‎妙厨贝蒂 听好
‎我不能同时出现在两个地方

translation.en: -[Frank] Wait a minute. -Darling.
[Frank] Maybe she could.
[Edward] What was that, Frank?
[Frank] Forgive me for pointing out the obvious,
but if Ms. Pembroke could successfully impersonate Her Majesty,
translation.zh: ‎既然潘布洛克小姐曾经成功假冒陛下

translation.en: it stands to reason that Her Majesty could impersonate Ms. Pembroke.
translation.zh: ‎那陛下自然也能假冒成潘布洛克小姐

translation.en: -[scoffs] Not in a million years. -[Frank squeaks]
Bite your tongue.
-It's completely out of the question. -[scoffs] Certainly, sir. I…
translation.zh:
‎-这个方法不在考虑范围之内
‎-是 殿下 ‎我只是心直口快 是我太愚昧了

translation.en: I was just thinking out loud. How very stupid of me.
translation.zh: ‎我只是心直口快 是我太愚昧了

translation.en: That's all right, Frank. We all come up with bad ideas now and again.
translation.zh: ‎不要紧的 馊主意谁没出过？

translation.en: -Indeed. -It is an outrageous idea.
translation.zh:
‎-殿下说得是
‎-其实那是上上之策

translation.en: But I did switch places with Stacy twice, and no one was the wiser.
translation.zh:
‎我曾经跟史黛西调换身份两次
‎没人看得出来

translation.en: [chuckling] Trading places with Ms. Pembroke?
translation.zh: ‎您要跟潘布洛克小姐调换身份？

translation.en: That's a different matter entirely.
Yeah, but all she'd have to do is keep Hunter busy
while they break into the gallery.
The whole thing should take less than an hour.
You can't be serious.
It really isn't that long.
[Fiona] Listen to me.
Hunter Cunard is a dangerous and complicated man.
translation.zh: ‎亨特·库纳是个性情复杂的危险人物

translation.en: No, Maggie could never pull it off.
translation.zh: ‎小玛格是永远模仿不了我的

translation.en: Why not?
Well, not to be unkind, Moo,
but you certainly don't have the, uh… [inhales] …je ne sais quoi.
translation.zh: ‎但我肯定你模仿不出我的精妙魅力

translation.en: [mimics Fiona] Minions, fetch me my champagne.
[scoffs] I do not sound like that.
[mimics Fiona] Hello, royal six-pack.
[laughs] Oh. Well, you sound exactly like that.
-I do not. -You do.
-But I don't. -But you do. -But I don't. -You really do.
Oh, she's good.
Look, I have to object. It's… it's far too risky.
translation.zh:
‎听好 我不得不反对
‎这个做法太危险了

translation.en: If it means recovering the Star…
translation.zh: ‎如果这么做能够找回和平之星

translation.en: [sighs] …it's a risk I'm willing to take.
Indeed.
Well, here we go again.
No, arch your back.
More.
Ugh, never mind.
What you need to do is tap into the video feed,
record five seconds, switch to playback, and route that through the auxiliary feed.
translation.zh:
‎录下五秒的影像
‎然后回放刚刚复制的实况视频

translation.en: -You got it? -Got it.
[Fiona] Ready?
[Margaret] Oh dear.
And one, two, three, four.
One, two, three, four.
One, two, three. You're starting to get the hang of it.
translation.zh: ‎一、二、三 你开始抓到诀窍了

translation.en: Oh, thank you.
[Fiona] Now, swing those hips.
[Margaret] I feel like I am.
[Fiona] Now you've got it. Let them know you're…
translation.zh: ‎你学会了 你要让旁人知道你在…

translation.en: [Fiona] Hunter and I met five years ago.
translation.zh: ‎我和亨特是在五年前认识的

translation.en: He plays tennis and polo, which is a total bore,
translation.zh:
‎他爱打网球和马球
‎两者都是非常沉闷的运动

translation.en: but he can't resist a good martini.
translation.zh: ‎但他对好喝的马丁尼毫无招架之力

translation.en: I told him I wanted to sell Pembroke.
translation.zh: ‎我跟他说过我有意卖掉潘布洛克庄园

translation.en: -You did? -Hm.
And he's excellent at the tango.
I might need to brush up. [chuckles]
Not to presume, Mr. Maxwell,
translation.zh: ‎麦斯威先生 我是认真的

translation.en: but if you are in need of a wheelman, I am more than happy to volunteer.
translation.zh:
‎如果你需要一个驾驶员
‎我很乐意帮忙

translation.en: Now, that's not something you see every day.
translation.zh: ‎这可不是天天都能看到的画面

translation.en: Hang on. The frame is wrong.
May I?
It's like this.
If I could please have everyone's attention.
May I present Fiona Pembroke.
And Fiona Pembroke.
[exhales] Any thoughts?
[hesitates] It's amazing.
And a bit unsettling.
I know exactly how you feel.
-I'll do the hair once you're in the gown. -I'll go change.
translation.zh:
‎-等你换上礼服后 我给你弄头发
‎-我这就去更衣

translation.en: -I think this might work. [laughs] -[Margaret] Mm.
-All right then. Let's get the van ready. -Right.
translation.zh:
‎-好吧 去把客货车准备好
‎-好的

translation.en: I was thinking maybe, when this is over,
translation.zh: ‎我心想 等我们完成任务后

translation.en: the two of us could spend some time together.
Oh, Peter, you know I never plan past lunch.
translation.zh:
‎波得 你明知道我午餐后
‎是没有约会的

translation.en: Wow. Should have seen that coming.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 我应该早料到了才对

translation.en: Seen what coming?
Has it ever occurred to you
that every time you start to feel something for someone, you pull away?
translation.zh:
‎每次你对人产生感情时
‎你都会开始逃避？

translation.en: From me, from your family, from everyone. This isn't the first time it's happened.
translation.zh:
‎你逃避我、逃避家人、逃避所有人
‎这已经不是第一次了

translation.en: Oh, please.
translation.zh:
‎-得了吧
‎-小潘潘 你就承认吧

translation.en: Admit it, Pemmie. You didn't leave because you had feelings for Hunter.
translation.zh:
‎-得了吧
‎-小潘潘 你就承认吧 ‎你离开不是因为你爱上了亨特

translation.en: You left because you had feelings for me, and it scared you.
translation.zh:
‎而是因为你爱上了我
‎这个真相让你感到害怕

translation.en: Is that what you really think?
What I really think is that you're so hurt by what happened to you when we were kids,
translation.zh:
‎我认为我们小时候
‎你的心灵受到了很大的伤害

translation.en: you're terrified of letting anyone in.
translation.zh: ‎所以你害怕让人走进你的心房

translation.en: You've always got a plane to catch or somewhere to be, just like your mum.
translation.zh:
‎你总是赶飞机 总想去某个地方
‎就跟你妈一样

translation.en: I'm nothing like her.
-I'm sorry, Fiona. I didn't mean-- -No, you meant every word.
translation.zh:
‎-菲欧娜 对不起 我不是有意的
‎-你说的每一句话都是真心话

translation.en: Let's just stick to business from now on, shall we?
translation.zh: ‎从现在开始 我们只谈公事好了

translation.en: Fine.
Business it is.
Van's ready.
[Peter] Brilliant.
It'll take us a while to get to Hunter's estate in this weather.
translation.zh:
‎这种天气下
‎要好一阵子才抵达亨特的庄园

translation.en: I'll be back at four.
[Reggie] Should we synchronize our watches?
Be ready to go.
Pete, I can show you how it's done. It's a button and a twisty-twisty.
translation.zh:
‎我可以教你怎么对表
‎只要转动某个按钮就可以了

translation.en: Come on. Permission to synchronize. That's what it is.
translation.zh: ‎别这样嘛 我们对一下表吧

translation.en: Hey, wait up, Pete. Pete!
I call shotgun.
-You can't call shotgun. -[chuckles] Why not?
Could it be because we don't want a cat burglar sitting in the front seat?
translation.zh:
‎因为我们不想
‎让一个飞贼坐在前座 懂吗？

translation.en: I'll get in the back.
I'm fine. I'm fine.
[Margaret] Wish me luck.
[Stacy] Good luck.
Just keep Hunter entertained, and everything will be fine.
translation.zh:
‎只要缠住亨特不放
‎一切都会水到渠成

translation.en: [Margaret] Fingers crossed.
I hope Margaret can carry this off.
translation.zh: ‎希望玛格丽特不会出差错吧

translation.en: Well, she pulled off being me. Remember?
translation.zh: ‎她上次乔装成我不也没被发现吗？

translation.en: That was different. Hunter Cunard's a criminal.
translation.zh: ‎那次情况不同 ‎亨特·库纳是个罪犯

translation.en: -If something goes wrong-- -Margaret can take care of herself.
translation.zh:
‎-万一出事了…
‎-玛格丽特懂得保护自己

translation.en: I'm so sorry to interrupt, but, uh, I have an urgent call
translation.zh:
‎抱歉 打扰一下 ‎我刚刚接到圣·迈克尔修道院院长
‎打来的紧急电话

translation.en: from Mother Superior at St. Michael's.
translation.zh:
‎我刚刚接到圣·迈克尔修道院院长
‎打来的紧急电话

translation.en: I told her Queen Margaret was otherwise occupied
translation.zh: ‎我跟她说玛格丽特女王忙不过来

translation.en: and that perhaps you could be of service.
Oh, okay.
Good evening, Mother Superior.
I deeply apologize for imposing, Your Highness,
translation.zh: ‎殿下 万分抱歉 打扰了您的清幽

translation.en: but, uh, something important's come up,
translation.zh: ‎只是我们这边有个紧急突发状况

translation.en: and I… I desperately need Queen Margaret's help.
translation.zh: ‎迫切需要玛格丽特女王出手相助

translation.en: Uh, well, I'm happy to give her the message.
translation.zh: ‎我很乐意帮你把消息转告给她

translation.en: [Mother Superior hesitates] It's a rather delicate matter.
You see, the disciplinary committee
translation.zh:
‎是这样的
‎纪委会原本计划在圣诞节过后

translation.en: was set to review Ms. Pembroke's case after Christmas,
translation.zh: ‎针对潘布洛克小姐的案子召开听证会

translation.en: but, uh, well, I've just received a call, and they've pushed up her review.
translation.zh:
‎可是我刚接到电话
‎纪委会打算提前召开听证会

translation.en: The committee will be here at seven o'clock.
translation.zh: ‎纪委会成员将在7点抵达修道院

translation.en: -[gasps] Tonight? -[Mother Superior] Tonight.
Now, I really must insist Ms. Pembroke return on the double.
translation.zh: ‎潘布洛克小姐必须迅速赶回修道院

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah, um, I don't know about that.
[Mother Superior] Please!
Your Highness, if it's discovered Ms. Pembroke isn't here,
translation.zh:
‎殿下 万一纪委会发现
‎潘布洛克小姐不在修道院

translation.en: then heads will roll, including mine.
translation.zh:
‎到时就有人受到责罚
‎就连我也难逃刑责啊

translation.en: The committee, well, they may recommend a jail sentence.
translation.zh: ‎纪委会搞不好会判她有期徒刑

translation.en: And not just for her.
Okay, okay. I'll… I'll see what I can do. Bye.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 我懂了 我想想办法 再见

translation.en: -[Stacey sighs] -What's wrong?
We have to get Fiona back to St. Michael's by seven,
translation.zh:
‎我们要在7点前
‎将菲欧娜送回圣·迈克尔修道院

translation.en: or she and Mother Superior are headed to the big house.
translation.zh: ‎不然她和院长就要吃牢饭了

translation.en: Stacy, Fiona's on her way to Cunard's party.
translation.zh:
‎史黛西
‎菲欧娜正在前往库纳家聚会的路上

translation.en: She can't be at the convent as well.
No.
Well, maybe…
No, no, no, no. I know what you're thinking. And no. Absolutely not. It's out of the question.
translation.zh:
‎不行 我知道你的想法
‎我绝不允许 想也不用想

translation.en: Edward, if Fiona doesn't show up, everything could go south.
translation.zh:
‎爱德华 如果菲欧娜缺席听证会
‎事情就会败露了

translation.en: The disciplinary committee is going to start asking questions that we don't want to answer.
translation.zh:
‎到时纪委会就会开始问一些
‎我们不想回答的问题

translation.en: Believe me, I don't want to do this either,
but I don't think we have a choice.
Then I'm going with you.
We're a team. Remember?
translation.zh: ‎我们是一个团队 你忘了吗？

translation.en: Go, team. [laughs]
[man] Good evening, ma'am.
How on earth does she walk in these things?
[sighs] Dear me.
[man] Sector one, sector two. You're good.
-Why are you hunched over like that? -'Cause this is the way it's done.
translation.zh:
‎-你们为什么弯腰弓背？
‎-因为这么做是对的

translation.en: -How would you know? -Everyone knows how it's done.
Could you speak a little louder so everyone knows we're breaking in?
translation.zh:
‎音量再大一点吧
‎让每个人都知道我们入屋行窃

translation.en: -Nice going. -Shh.
-You shush! -Shh.
What do you think?
Absolutely terrifying.
Let's go.
Okay.
[man 1] There you are, miss.
[man 2] Fiona. Fiona Pembroke?
Don't you remember your old pal, Simon?
translation.zh: ‎你忘了我是你的老朋友西蒙吗？

translation.en: From Aldovia?
Meow. [chuckles]
-Hm. -Ma chérie.
-I'm so glad that you could make it. -Oh, how could I resist one of these?
translation.zh: ‎很高兴你来了 ‎我怎么抗拒得了这杯马丁尼呢？

translation.en: Would you, uh, like to see my Christmas tree?
translation.zh: ‎要不要见识一下我的圣诞树？

translation.en: I would love to see your tree. [chuckles]
The Star of Peace.
Right where you said it would be.
Let's go.
-[sighs] Okay. -[Reggie] Santa to Rudolph. Come in, Rudolph. Rudolph, do you read me?
translation.zh:
‎圣诞老人呼叫红鼻子驯鹿
‎请回复 收到吗？

translation.en: I already told you I'm not using those code names.
-Why not? -Because they're stupid.
translation.zh:
‎-为什么？
‎-因为这些名字很难听

translation.en: -Now would you let me concentrate? -[Reggie] Ooh!
Well, there's no need to take that tone.
translation.zh: ‎没必要用这种语气对我说话吧

translation.en: What's new?
Not a bloody thing.
So, you never did tell me if you're still in touch with that Peter Maxwell.
translation.zh:
‎你没跟我说过你和彼得·麦斯威
‎还有没有联系

translation.en: I haven't spoken to that repellent little toad in years.
translation.zh:
‎我已经有好几年没见过
‎那个难缠的癞蛤蟆

translation.en: Don't we have some business to discuss?
Oh, yes. The, uh, purchase of your estate.
translation.zh: ‎没错 谈谈你要卖掉庄园的事

translation.en: But, uh, I'm a firm believer in pleasure before business.
translation.zh:
‎但我向来遵从
‎“享乐在先 生意在后”的原则

translation.en: You nasty boy.
Wait here.
Oh dear lord!
-The keypad was supposed to be here. -[sighs]
Check over there.
[Hunter] What do you mean, out of vintage champagne?
Put it back.
-I don't know what happened. -It's your job to know what happened.
translation.zh:
‎-我不知道是怎么回事
‎-你的职责是找出原因

translation.en: [woman] Well, I just--
God, all you do is make excuses. I want you gone. Tonight.
translation.zh:
‎天啊  你只会找借口
‎我要你今晚滚出庄园

translation.en: But, sir, it's Christmas.
translation.zh: ‎老板 现在正逢圣诞季啊

translation.en: [mocking] "Sir, it's Christmas."
translation.zh: ‎“老板 现在正逢圣诞季啊”

translation.en: Get out of my sight.
-Now. -[glasses clink]
-[sighs] -That was uncomfortably close.
Oh. On the bright side,
found the keypad.
How on earth does she walk in these things?
No idea.
-Are you okay? -[Edward] Well, more or less.
Never done anything like this before.
[exhales] Yeah, um, just try and be chill.
Right, yes. Chilling.
[Mother Superior] Okay. Come!
Ms. Pembroke. [chuckles nervously] There you are.
translation.zh: ‎潘布洛克小姐 你终于到了

translation.en: You're very late.
Correction, official man. I'm fashionably late.
translation.zh: ‎大人 纠正一下 这叫姗姗来迟

translation.en: Take a seat.
-[Edward] Ladies and gentlemen-- -Aren't you--
Prince Edward of Belgravia.
translation.zh: ‎我是来自贝尔格莱维亚的爱德华王子

translation.en: Ms. Pembroke kidnapped my wife,
translation.zh: ‎潘布洛克小姐绑架过我的妻子

translation.en: and I thought, if anybody should be a character witness on her behalf,
translation.zh: ‎如果你们要找个人来评价她的品行

translation.en: well, it would be me.
But you just said she kidnapped your wife.
translation.zh: ‎但你刚说她绑架过你的妻子

translation.en: Yes, I did.
And she did, but since then, she has reformed.
translation.zh:
‎她确实绑架过我的妻子
‎不过事后她已经洗心革面了

translation.en: You see, underneath all of, uh… uh, that, Ms. Pembroke really has a good heart.
translation.zh:
‎撇除潘布洛克小姐的外表
‎她内心其实是个善良的人

translation.en: And yes, she has made some mistakes,
but isn't our ability to forgive a measure of our own humanity?
translation.zh:
‎但原谅他人的力量
‎不也是衡量品性的标准吗？

translation.en: Especially at Christmas.
Is there anything you'd like to add?
Everything His Royal Hotness says is true.
I've made some hideous mistakes.
In fact, if you need to extend my sentence,
translation.zh: ‎其实如果你们有意延长刑期

translation.en: I completely understand.
Actually, I recommend it.
translation.zh: ‎其实我还想建议你们延长刑期呢

translation.en: -[Edward] She doesn't mean that. -Oh, but I do.
translation.zh:
‎-她没有那个意思
‎-我确实有这个意思

translation.en: -No, you don't. -I do.
-No, you don't. -I do.
-No, you don't. -I think we've heard enough.
translation.zh:
‎-没有
‎-有 ‎我看听证会就到此为止吧

translation.en: I'd like to confer with my colleagues for a moment.
translation.zh: ‎我要跟同事们开会商议一下

translation.en: -Of course. -Take all the time you need.
[Peter] Damn it, it's not connecting.
Try my birthday. December 14th.
You and Hunter haven't been together for more than five years.
translation.zh: ‎你和亨特已经五年多没见面了

translation.en: He's not going to remember your birthday.
[scoffs] Trust me. I made an impression.
translation.zh: ‎相信我 我总能让人念念不忘

translation.en: Fine.
[sighs] Here he comes.
Well, that took forever.
Oh, trust me. It's worth the wait.
translation.zh: ‎相信我 等这么久是值得的

translation.en: Merry Christmas.
Doesn't the duchess of Marlborough have this same bracelet?
translation.zh:
‎马尔堡公爵夫人
‎不也有一条一模一样的手链吗？

translation.en: And matching earrings?
translation.zh: ‎还有一对同款的耳环 对吧？

translation.en: You know, I think I left those earrings upstairs.
Shall we go and fetch them?
But they're playing a tango.
You always loved a good tango.
Then let's dance.
Are you ready to go upstairs and find those earrings?
translation.zh: ‎准备好要上楼去找那对耳环了吗？

translation.en: [pants] So hot. I need water.
We've reached a decision regarding Ms. Pembroke.
translation.zh:
‎针对潘布洛克小姐的刑责
‎我们已经有了裁决

translation.en: The fact that she was late for this meeting
indicates a troubling disregard for authority.
Added to her past transgressions,
translation.zh: ‎加上她过去犯下的种种违法行为

translation.en: it would appear that increasing her sentence is warranted.
If I may be allowed to say, uh, just one more point about my wi… Ms. Pembroke--
translation.zh:
‎请容我为我的妻…
‎不是 是潘布洛克小姐再说几句话

translation.en: If you'll allow me to finish please, Your Highness, sir,
I said it was warranted,
but I don't believe it's the right thing to do.
Ms. Pembroke,
the committee is very impressed with your sincere remorse.
translation.zh: ‎纪委会对你真诚反省的态度感到欣慰

translation.en: You truly aren't the person we met with before.
translation.zh:
‎你跟我们先前所认识的潘布洛克小姐
‎不是同一个人

translation.en: I truly am not.
Based on the testimony of your character witness
as well as the recommendations of Mother Superior,
we hereby commute the remainder of your sentence.
translation.zh: ‎纪委会一致决定免去剩余的刑责

translation.en: It's a Christmas miracle!
[hesitates] Of course we will miss you terribly.
Oh, of course you will.
Well, we best be going.
-[chuckles] -Yes.
Thank you very much, and of course, Merry Christmas.
translation.zh: ‎万分感激 也祝你们圣诞快乐

translation.en: I'm not sure how I feel about getting Fiona off the hook.
translation.zh: ‎不知道帮菲欧娜摆脱刑责是对是错

translation.en: -Let's not worry about that right now. -[scoffs]
translation.zh: ‎我们还是先别担心这件事吧

translation.en: You know, it's deliciously exhilarating engaging in all this skulduggery.
translation.zh:
‎话说做这种偷龙转凤的勾当
‎令人又兴奋又疲倦

translation.en: -[laughs] Come on. -Ah.
That wasn't supposed to happen.
Hey. What's that?
It's a sensor in the gallery.
Something's happening. I think it's an alarm.
translation.zh: ‎出事了 好像是触动了警铃

translation.en: -Well, sort it out then! -I don't know what to do!
translation.zh:
‎-那就赶紧解决啊
‎-我不知道怎么解决

translation.en: -Use the laptop! Turn it off and on again. -I don't think that's gonna work!
translation.zh:
‎-关掉笔电 重新开启
‎-我不觉得行得通

translation.en: [Reggie] Google it!
Take this.
Hold on. It stopped.
For now, but the jig is up. You got to get out of there.
translation.zh:
‎暂时的 但事情败露了
‎你赶紧离开现场吧

translation.en: -Maybe the music's vibration set it off. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-可能受到音乐震动影响吧
‎-没错

translation.en: Psst! Frank! Mayday, Frank. Mayday! Abort the mission.
translation.zh: ‎弗兰克 出大事了 终止任务！

translation.en: -What? -Get in the van!
What about Fiona and Peter?
Me and Frankie boy, we're getting out while the getting's good.
translation.zh: ‎趁还来得及 我和弗兰克先走一步了

translation.en: I ain't ending up six foot under.
Okay, I'm coming.
Oh God.
Let's go.
Stay here.
Oh. But… but… I've… I've cooled off now.
-I'll only be a minute. -[exhales]
-I'll be back as fast as I can. -[gasps]
[exhales] Don't panic. Keep calm and carry on.
translation.zh: ‎别紧张 冷静 坚持住

translation.en: [exhales] And run.
-[man 1] Check on that room! -They're coming. Take it.
translation.zh:
‎-去检查那个房间
‎-他们来了 拿去

translation.en: What about you?
Just take it. Go. I'll distract them.
translation.zh: ‎赶紧拿去 我去引开他们

translation.en: [man 2] Hey! Over here!
[man 3 on comm] He's heading to the east stairway.
Alpha team to the east exit.
[inhales] Almost there.
[man 4] Your cape, Your Majesty.
[chuckles] Thank you.
All right! Let's get the hell out of here!
Move it, Frank!
But Ms. Pembroke is not here!
translation.zh: ‎可是潘布洛克小姐还没回来

translation.en: It's everyone for themselves! Come on!
translation.zh: ‎人不为己 天诛地灭！ ‎快开车

translation.en: -[man yells indistinctly] -[Reggie whimpers]
Oh dear.
Over here. Over… Stop! Come back here at once!
translation.zh: ‎我在这里 停车 马上给我回来！

translation.en: Frank!
[laughs] That feels much better.
[screams] You're all fired! Do you hear me?
translation.zh: ‎你们通通被开除了 听到了吗？

translation.en: No more free vacays and booze!
translation.zh:
‎我以后不会再带你们去免费度假
‎也不请你们喝酒了

translation.en: -Oh! What are you doing? -[Mindy groans]
Thank God.
[Frank screams] Fear not, Ms. Pembroke!
-I will save you. -[man] Don't let them get away!
translation.zh: ‎我来救你了 ‎别让他们逃跑了

translation.en: Ms. Pembroke, come with me if you want to live.
translation.zh: ‎潘布洛克小姐 想活命就跟我走

translation.en: [scoffs] Go!
-Right there! Right there! -Get it!
-I'll call the police. -No.
No police, idiot.
And shut off that alarm.
There you are. -We were so worried about you. -Zsst.
translation.zh: ‎你们回来了 我们很担心你们呢

translation.en: Explain.
Well, Mother Superior called,
and your disciplinary meeting got pushed up,
so I had to be you.
But never mind me. Are you guys okay?
translation.zh: ‎别理我了 你们都没事吧？

translation.en: Well, more or less. There was a bit of a hitch.
Peter had to stay behind to create a diversion.
But he was able to escape?
Well, we still haven't heard from him, so we don't know.
translation.zh: ‎我们还没有他的消息 所以不清楚

translation.en: Well, did you get the Star?
Of course we did, royal worrywart.
[Margaret] Uh, Fiona.
What is it?
He switched it.
Which means Peter has the Star.
translation.zh: ‎如今和平之星落在彼得手上了

translation.en: He fooled every one of us into thinking we could trust him.
translation.zh: ‎他骗了我们所有人 让我们相信他

translation.en: After everything we went through? I can't believe it.
translation.zh:
‎我们一起经历了这么多
‎他竟然骗了我们？真是难以置信

translation.en: [Margaret] Fiona.
Fiona, you can't feel bad about this.
translation.zh: ‎菲欧娜 你不用为这件事自责

translation.en: Yeah, it really isn't your fault.
Well, then whose fault is it?
-We're back! Merry Chri-- -We're back!
translation.zh:
‎-我们回来了
‎-我们回来了 圣诞…

translation.en: What the… Who the…
-Huh? -What's going on?
I can explain everything.
Which one are you?
It's okay, Kev. That's Margaret, not Fiona.
translation.zh:
‎凯文 没事的
‎那个是玛格丽特 不是菲欧娜

translation.en: -Stacy? -Yeah.
-And that's Margaret? -Mm-hmm.
-Are you sure? -Let me prove it to you.
translation.zh:
‎-你确定吗？
‎-我来证明给你看吧

translation.en: -No, no, no. -[Margaret] Shh.
[exhales] Okay. It's you.
-Mm. -Phew. That was really strange.
I guess we should call a press conference and let everyone know what's happened.
translation.zh:
‎看来我们应该召开记者会
‎公布和平之星失窃的消息了

translation.en: [Edward] I can see the headline now.
"Saint Nicholas's Star of Peace gone forever."
I suppose we should cancel everything.
translation.zh: ‎我认为我们应该取消所有活动

translation.en: The tree lighting, all of it.
Well, first, let's start by informing Inspector Moretti and the cardinal.
translation.zh: ‎先知会莫拉蒂督察和主教吧

translation.en: They deserve to be prepared before all hell breaks loose.
translation.zh:
‎在事情尚未爆发前
‎应该让他们有所准备

translation.en: Yes, sir.
Oh, um, you should know the disciplinary committee waived the rest of your sentence.
translation.zh:
‎你知道纪委会
‎已经免除你剩余的刑责了吗？

translation.en: -What was that? -[Stacy] No more community service.
translation.zh: ‎怎么说？ ‎你不用再履行社会服务了

translation.en: You're done.
[Reggie] You hear that, Fifi?
You're as free as a bird.
Even so, we're hoping you'll stay and spend the holidays with us.
translation.zh:
‎不过我们还是希望
‎你可以留下来共度佳节

translation.en: There's a noon flight to Capri tomorrow.
translation.zh: ‎明天中午有一班前往卡普里岛的航班

translation.en: We can make it if we leave after breakfast.
translation.zh: ‎吃过早餐后还来得及赶上航班

translation.en: [scoffs] Capri it is.
translation.zh:
‎-我们就去卡普里岛吧
‎-太好了

translation.en: -Yes! -Joyeux Noel, mes amours.
-Hello, dear. -Hello. [chuckles]
Mummy, Mummy, Mummy!
[Mindy] Manderston Academy? What we doing here?
-[Reggie] Looks like a school to me. -[Mindy] Brilliant deduction, Sherlock.
translation.zh: ‎这地方看起来像一间学校 ‎好精辟的推理 大侦探福尔摩斯

translation.en: [boy] Merry Christmas!
I hated school. Skipped most of it.
translation.zh: ‎我最讨厌上学了 以前经常逃课

translation.en: That explains a lot.
Hey, Fifi, where you going?
-Stop talking. -[girl] Emily, I'm gonna miss you so much!
translation.zh:
‎闭嘴 ‎-艾米丽 我会很想念你的
‎-我也是

translation.en: -Me too. Happy Holidays! -[girl] Bye! Have a great Christmas!
translation.zh:
‎-艾米丽 我会很想念你的
‎-我也是 ‎-佳节愉快
‎-再见 圣诞快乐

translation.en: Where's the Star, Peter?
I needed to get your attention.
translation.zh: ‎只有这么做才能引起你的注意

translation.en: [scoffs] I want the Star.
And you'll get it.
But in exchange, I need you to pop around to the dining hall.
translation.zh: ‎但作为交换条件 我要你前往餐室

translation.en: What on earth for?
She wants to talk to you.
How dare you tell me what to do?
Someone has to, or you'll just go on living an empty, hollow life.
translation.zh:
‎总得有人拦住你 ‎不然你会继续过着
‎空虚且毫无意义的人生

translation.en: [scoffs] So that's why you double-crossed me, to let me know I'm destined to be lonely and miserable?
translation.zh:
‎你骗我就是为了让我知道
‎我注定是个孤独绝望的人？

translation.en: More or less.
Do you want to give me what I came here for?
translation.zh: ‎你到底要不要把我要的东西交出来？

translation.en: Or shall I call the police and have you arrested?
I know I said I'd always be there for you, Pemmie,
translation.zh:
‎小潘潘
‎虽然我说过我会永远在你身边

translation.en: but this is the end of the line for us.
That's a relief.
Hello, Mummy.
I didn't think you'd come.
I wasn't going to,
but Peter said you wanted to speak to me, so go ahead.
Speak.
The apple doesn't fall far from the tree, does it?
Is that what you've waited all these years to tell me?
translation.zh:
‎你等了这么多年
‎只为了跟我说这句话？

translation.en: Fiona darling, we can't go on like this.
translation.zh:
‎亲爱的菲欧娜
‎我们的关系不能再坏下去了

translation.en: Oh, I don't see why not.
You know, I've spent the last few years traveling the world
translation.zh: ‎过去几年以来 我周游各地

translation.en: trying to find some inner peace.
Eat, Pray, Love. It's so last decade.
translation.zh:
‎就像《美食、祈祷和恋爱》中的情节
‎好过时

translation.en: [Bianca] That may be.
But it was on a retreat at an ashram in Rishikesh
that I finally realized that there has been a void in my life.
translation.zh:
‎我终于意识到
‎我的人生一直有个空洞

translation.en: Something missing.
And it's my daughter.
Fiona. Fiona…
I love you more than anything or anyone.
I always have.
Do you have any idea what it was like
translation.zh: ‎你理解那种努力把自己变得够好

translation.en: trying to be good enough to be noticed by you? Trying to be good enough to matter to you?
translation.zh:
‎只为了引起你关注
‎以及让你重视我的感受吗？

translation.en: Better than you think.
Oh no, that is a lie.
You always had somewhere else you had to be.
translation.zh: ‎你总是有某个要去的目的地

translation.en: You always had a plane to catch.
I was running away.
-[scoffs] -No, not from you.
Never from you.
Your father was…
Your father was cruel to me,
and rather than suffer it,
I did whatever I could to get as far away from him as possible.
translation.zh: ‎所以竭尽所能地离他远远的

translation.en: Oh, so you're here to make excuses.
No, there's… there's no excuse for what I did.
translation.zh: ‎不是 我的所作所为不值得原谅

translation.en: You're damned right there isn't.
I've carried this around for years.
Do you remember?
You gave it to me when you were ten. [chuckles]
When I was here, I used to steal little trinkets,
translation.zh: ‎以前住在这里时 我经常偷些小饰品

translation.en: wrap them up so that on Christmas,
translation.zh: ‎把它们包扎起来 等圣诞节到了

translation.en: I could open them and pretend they were from you.
translation.zh: ‎我会拆开来 假装是你送来的礼物

translation.en: I loved you so much, and I tried.
I tried so hard not to care that I wasn't worthy of being loved back.
translation.zh:
‎我很努力地将自己不值得被爱的事实
‎抛诸脑后

translation.en: Oh, Fiona, you wonderful, perfect little girl. I…
translation.zh:
‎菲欧娜 ‎-别过来
‎-你是妈妈美好无暇的女儿

translation.en: I was a wretched mother,
and even though I don't deserve it,
I'm… I'm hoping that you can find it in your heart to forgive me.
translation.zh:
‎但我希望你能打从心里找到平安
‎然后原谅我

translation.en: Please, darling. Just give me a second chance.
translation.zh: ‎求你了 亲爱的 给妈妈一个机会吧

translation.en: Well, who knows how many Christmases we have left, you and I?
translation.zh:
‎谁知道我们还能一起过
‎多少个圣诞节呢？

translation.en: It's too late.
[sobs] Fiona.
♪ You've been on my mind ♪ ♪ On my mind ♪
translation.zh:
‎（妈妈 圣诞快乐
‎来自爱你的菲欧娜）

translation.en: Hey! Come on, Fifi!
We've got a plane to catch.
Fifi.
-What? -[Reggie] Where you going? Come back!
translation.zh:
‎-菲菲
‎-怎么了？ ‎你要上哪儿去？回来！

translation.en: Come back! We've got a flight to catch!
-[Reggie] What you doing? We've got to go! -Come back! We can't drive this!
translation.zh:
‎-你搞什么？快没时间了！
‎-回来 这辆车我们开不动

translation.en: [Bianca] Oh, darling.
Shh, shh. It's okay. It's okay. -♪ Home is where the love is ♪ -It's okay. [chuckles]
Hey, everything is gonna be okay. I promise.
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的 不会有事的 相信我

translation.en: Right this way, please.
Cardinal Amoah, Inspector Moretti,
so good of you to come on such short notice.
translation.zh: ‎很高兴你们收到消息后马上赶来

translation.en: Your message said it was urgent.
[exhales] I'm feeling a little bit queasy.
Please take a seat.
I do hope everything is all right.
-Um-- -It isn't all right. -[sighs] -It's fabulous, darling.
translation.zh: ‎何止安好 简直美翻了 亲爱的

translation.en: We gave the old thing a bit of a polish.
translation.zh: ‎我们把这个古董拿去打磨了一下

translation.en: I do hope you don't mind, Your Eminence.
Mind? It looks spectacular. Gratias ago Deo.
translation.zh:
‎介意？和平之星看起来美仑美奂
‎感谢上帝

translation.en: Hm? Botticelli, Versace.
Aw, Auntie Bianca, what a pleasure to see you again.
translation.zh: ‎碧昂卡阿姨 很高兴再次见到你

translation.en: -Pleasure to be seen. -[chuckles] [chuckling] And who do we have here?
Mummy, please.
So, will the two of you be staying with us for Christmas?
translation.zh: ‎你们母女俩要留下来一起过圣诞吗？

translation.en: [exhales] Well, if it's all right with Maggie Moo.
All right?
[scoffs] We'd be delighted to have you. You're family.
translation.zh:
‎我们很乐意跟你们共度圣诞
‎毕竟我们是一家人

translation.en: I suppose we are.
[Stacy] Um, Fiona?
I know you and I don't have that much in common,
really anything in common.
translation.zh: ‎说真的 我们确实没有任何共同点

translation.en: I just want to say I'm really grateful for all you've done.
translation.zh:
‎但有些话不得不说
‎我很感激你所做的一切

translation.en: -You could have just disappeared. -Oh, I've actually given up disappearing.
translation.zh: ‎你原本可以一走了之的 ‎我已经不想再闹失踪了

translation.en: Glad to hear it.
By the way, how did you convince Peter to give you back the Star?
translation.zh:
‎话说你是怎么说服彼得
‎把和平之星交还给你的？

translation.en: Oh yeah.
He intended to, all along.
So does that mean he'll be joining us for Christmas?
translation.zh:
‎这是不是意味着
‎他也会跟我们一起过圣诞？

translation.en: Peter and I decided to go our separate ways.
[Stacy] Oh no.
I'm so sorry.
Don't be. It's for the best.
translation.zh: ‎不用感到惋惜 这是最好的结果

translation.en: I think you need a hug.
Please, no.
No… There it is.
Hey, my family is from the Philippines. We do hugs.
translation.zh:
‎我家人来自菲律宾
‎抱抱是我们的习俗

translation.en: ♪ Up on the housetop, the reindeer pause ♪
♪ Out jumps good ol' Santa Claus ♪
♪ Down through the chimney With lots of toys ♪
♪ All for the little ones Christmas joys ♪
translation.zh: ‎给小朋友带来专属于圣诞节的欢乐

translation.en: -♪ Ho, ho, ho! Who wouldn't go? ♪ -[woman yodels]
♪ Ho, ho, ho! Who wouldn't go? ♪
♪ Up on the housetop Click, click, click ♪
♪ Down through the chimney With good Saint Nick ♪
After all we went through, it's a miracle this came together.
translation.zh: ‎我们经历了种种磨难 ‎终究迎来了一个奇迹

translation.en: Ah, I knew it would.
You didn't tell me what happened to Hunter Cunard.
translation.zh: ‎你还没跟我说亨特·库纳的情况

translation.en: Oh, the police arrested him last night trying to flee the country.
translation.zh:
‎他昨晚企图逃出国
‎结果警察及时逮捕了他

translation.en: Guessing he's gonna spend a long time in jail.
translation.zh: ‎看来他将在监狱里待上好一阵子

translation.en: Well, deservedly so.
I gave them the diamond bracelet as well.
translation.zh: ‎我把钻石手链也交给警方了

translation.en: Did you happen to keep those red heels?
translation.zh: ‎那你有没有收下那双红色高跟鞋？

translation.en: Kevin!
I couldn't be more proud of you and Queen Margaret, of course,
translation.zh: ‎我为你和玛格丽特女王感到骄傲

translation.en: for putting together a beautiful event like this.
translation.zh: ‎是你们促成了如此赏心悦目的活动

translation.en: Well, I couldn't have done it without you.
Well, I dare say we make a great team.
translation.zh: ‎都说我们是个默契十足的团队了

translation.en: Just like that dashing chap who dresses up like a bat
translation.zh: ‎就像那个把自己打扮成蝙蝠的帅哥

translation.en: and his, uh, beautiful catlike companion.
translation.zh: ‎以及他那个长得像猫的美女同伴

translation.en: [laughs] Babe, Batman and Catwoman aren't a team.
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的 蝙蝠侠和猫女不是同伙

translation.en: Of course they are.
I love you.
[chuckles] Cheers, darling.
You know, this is the best Christmas I have ever had.
translation.zh: ‎这是我人生中最幸福的圣诞节

translation.en: Oh, because someone spiked the eggnog?
No, it's because I have my beautiful daughter back.
translation.zh: ‎不是 因为有我漂亮的女儿陪着我

translation.en: So, is this how it's going to be between us?
All gooey and sentimental?
Mm-hmm. Oh yeah. Come here.
Merry Christmas, darling.
Merry Christmas, Mummy.
Love you.
Guru Adishankar, it's so lovely to see you.
translation.zh: ‎阿迪尚卡大师 很高兴见到你

translation.en: [laughing] I'm so happy!
-I'm so glad we're together. -Oh my!
translation.zh:
‎-很高兴我们一家团聚了
‎-天啊

translation.en: -Look at this guy! -[laughs]
You! You look bangin', bro.
[Mindy] Well, hello, Mr. Handsome.
[Peter] Talk about clichés.
Beautiful woman, alone on Christmas, gazing up at the night sky.
translation.zh: ‎一个美女在圣诞夜里独自仰望天空

translation.en: Hm. I expected better from you.
I didn't think I'd see you again.
I was mad at you, Pemmie,
translation.zh: ‎小潘潘 我确实对你感到气馁

translation.en: because you didn't care about me as much as I cared about you.
translation.zh:
‎因为你在乎我的程度
‎不如我在乎你的程度

translation.en: And that's not a good reason to be mad at someone, so…
translation.zh: ‎即使如此 也不足以让我跟你置气

translation.en: so I came back to apologize.
It's my turn to apologize.
You were right.
I do shut people out. It's always felt safer that way.
translation.zh:
‎我把人拒之门外
‎只有这样我才感到安全

translation.en: But now?
It's what Mummy said.
We never know how much time we have left with the people we care about.
translation.zh:
‎我们永远都不知道
‎还能跟我们在乎的人共度多少时光

translation.en: [sighs] And we can't waste it.
Promise me you and I won't waste any more time.
translation.zh:
‎答应我
‎我们俩不要再浪费一分一秒了

translation.en: I promise.
Swear.
No matter what.
No matter where.
Ladies and gentlemen,
before we light our tree,
we just wanted to say how happy and grateful we are
translation.zh:
‎我们只想让你们知道
‎看到你们今晚出现

translation.en: that you all are here tonight.
And our greatest hope is that the Christmas spirit of goodwill and love
translation.zh:
‎我们最大的愿望是
‎圣诞节的友好和博爱精神

translation.en: fill the world and shine as brightly as the Star of Peace.
translation.zh:
‎能够充满全世界
‎就如和平之星的光芒般闪闪发亮

translation.en: So without further ado, Princess Olivia, will you do the honors?
translation.zh:
‎事不宜迟 奥利维亚公主
‎请你为我们主持亮灯仪式吧

translation.en: ♪ Deck the halls with boughs of holly ♪
♪ 'Tis the season to be jolly ♪
♪ Don we now our gay apparel ♪
Oh my God! Phew!
